programme.title: Haizivis ar Stīvu Bekšalu
programme.desc: Pasaulslavenais haizivju eksperts Stīvs Bekšals piedāvā aizraujošu dokumentālo stāstu sēriju, atklājot haizivju noslēpumus. Viņš ceļos pa pasauli un kliedēs mītu, ka šis radījums ir nekas vairāk kā aukstasinīgs slepkava. Piedzīvojumu meklējumi aizvedīs Stīvu no ledainām okeānu dzīlēm līdz siltām tropu piekrastēm, izpētot katru haizivju sugu. Tā kā haizivju populācija visā pasaulē strauji samazinās, Stīvs Bekšals cer, ka, gūstot lielāku izpratni par šīm radībām, tas mudinās cilvēkus glābt haizivis no izzušanas.

programme.title: Haizivis ar Stīvu Bekšalu
programme.desc: Pasaulslavenais haizivju eksperts Stīvs Bekšals piedāvā aizraujošu dokumentālo stāstu sēriju, atklājot haizivju noslēpumus. Viņš ceļos pa pasauli un kliedēs mītu, ka šis radījums ir nekas vairāk kā aukstasinīgs slepkava. programme.title: Viss zudis
programme.desc: Kuģojot vienatnē pa Indijas okeānu, kāds nezināms vīrs (Roberts Redfords) attopas un secina, ka viņa jahtā ieplūst ūdens pēc sadursmes ar okeānā peldošu konteineru. Navigācijas inventārs un rācija nedarbojas, tāpēc vīrs nejauši nonāk mežonīgā negaisā. Lai gan viņam izdodas aizdrīvēt jahtas korpusu, jūrnieka intuīcija un vecumam netipiskais spēks ļauj tikai par mata tiesu izglābties no bojāejas vētrā. Izmantojot tikai sekstantu un navigācijas kartes, vīrietis ir spiests paļauties uz okeāna straumēm, lai nokļūtu uz kuģošanas ceļiem, kur varētu palīdzēt kāds garām peldošs kuģis. Taču saule nežēlīgi svilina, apkārt riņķo haizivis un krājumi izsīkst, tāpēc jūrnieks drīz vien sāk apzināties, ka ir mirstīgs.

programme.title: Savs vāģis
programme.desc: Trīs lietuviešu slavenības īsteno unikālu eksperimentu un mēģina pārveidot leģendārus auto par nākotnes elektromašīnām. Viņiem nāksies pieņemt daudz sarežģītu lēmumu: ietaupīt naudu uz diskiem vai ātrās uzlādes ligzdu, atstāt bagāžniekā rezerves riteni vai pievienot papildu akumulatoru? Ko darīt, kad automobiļa restaurācijas laikā atklājas defekti, kurus iepriekšējie īpašnieki bija slēpuši? Projekta beigās automašīnām būs jāiziet stingra ekspertīze. Pastāv liels risks, ka pēc sešu mēnešu darba un tūkstošiem iztērētu eiro automašīnas nekad netiks palaistas ceļu satiksmē. Divdesmit nedēļu ilgā ceļojuma laikā dalībniekiem padomus sniegs šova vadītājs, sacīkšu braucējs Antans Juknevičs.

programme.title: Zebra. Zebra Yr 9 (2025) Ep. 935
programme.desc: Raidījuma vadmotīvs ir nemainīgs – drošība un ātrums! Tēmu loks tāpat – satiksmes drošība, satiksmes organizācija un iespējamie risinājumi. Transportlīdzekļu vadītājiem un gājējiem saistošu likumu un noteikumu izmaiņas, Eiropas valstu pieredze satiksmes problēmu risināšanā. Sava daļa stāstu būs atvēlēta sportiem, kas saistīti ar ātrumu. Raidījums visiem, kas ceļā! Raidījuma vadītājs – Pauls Timrots.

programme.title: Pēdējie izdzīvojušie
programme.desc: Pēc postoša kara pasaulē dzīvs palicis vien retais. Trojs un viņa dēls Džeiks dzīvo nomaļā mājiņā tālu no civilizācijas. Kad Troju ievaino svešinieks, Džeiks ir spiests doties sameklēt medikamentus. Trojs ir pavēlējis Džeikam nogalināt jebkuru cilvēku, ko viņš sastop. Džeiks ignorē tēva norādījumus un satuvinās ar sievieti vārdā Henrieta. Pēc sarunām ar Henrietu jaunais vīrietis sāk apšaubīt sava tēva stāstīto. Vai tiešām apokaliptiskā katastrofa nemaz nav notikusi?

programme.title: Īstie meli
programme.desc: Dzīves garlaikotās lingvistikas profesores Helēnas skatījumā viņas vīra Harija ikdiena ir tikpat pelēcīga kā visiem – rutīnas darbs, kurā nekas aizraujošs nenotiek. Taču tad Helēna nejauši atklāj Harija patieso identitāti: viņš nav vienkāršs biroja darbinieks, bet gan augsti kvalificēts slepenais aģents, kurš slepus cīnās pret starptautiskiem teroristiem. Harija noslēpumainā dzīve Helēnu ierauj pasaulē, kurā adrenalīns un briesmas ir ikdiena, un, spindzot lodēm, abu attiecībās iedegas jauna dzirksts.

programme.title: Īstie meli
programme.desc: Dzīves garlaikotās lingvistikas profesores Helēnas skatījumā viņas vīra Harija ikdiena ir tikpat pelēcīga kā visiem – rutīnas darbs, kurā nekas aizraujošs nenotiek. programme.title: Zāģeri. Lietaskoks 2
programme.desc: Mežcirtēju darbs ir bīstams, taču ienes labu algu. Itālijas ziemeļos plosījusies vētra, bet tās nestie postījumi ir laba biznesa iespēja: atliek tikai savākt nokritušos kokus un pārvērst tos naudā. Tomēr darbs ir gan grūts, gan atbildīgs, te ik mirkli kaut kas var noiet greizi. Turklāt mežā uzradušies arī nelūgti viesi – mizgrauži. To nodarītais kaitējums ekosistēmai ir milzīgs, un vienīgais veids, kā novērst to postošo ietekmi, ir ātri iejaukties un izcirst kokus. Spiesti ieguldīt jaudīgākās iekārtās, mežstrādnieki riskēs ar visu, lai uzveiktu postītājus, kas apdraud viņu darbu.

programme.title: Zāģeri. Lietaskoks 2
programme.desc: Mežcirtēju darbs ir bīstams, taču ienes labu algu. programme.title: Skrējiens savvaļā ar Bēru Grilsu 5
programme.desc: Pasaulē zināmākais izdzīvošanas eksperts un piedzīvojumu meklētājs Bērs Grilss ne reizi vien ir šokējis skatītājus ar pārdrošiem izgājieniem savvaļā. Viņš spēj izdzīvot pat šķietami neiedomājamos apstākļos un mudina savos piedzīvojumos līdzi doties arī dažādām slavenībām. Iespēju uz īsu brīdi aizbēgt no ikdienā valdošās kņadas un iepazīt dzīvi no citas perspektīvas piektajā sezonā izmantos gan Zeks Efrons un Bens Stillers, gan Čenings Teitums un Tamrona Hola. Zvaigznes pārbaudīs savu bezbailību Panamas džungļos starp izsalkušiem krokodiliem, Arizonas tuksnesī un pat Islandes ledājos.

programme.title: Sporta momenti
programme.desc: Dokumentālās sērijas aplūko aizraujošos stāstus, ko atklāj slavenākās fotogrāfijas sporta vēsturē. Iemūžinātie mirkļi ataino spilgtākos divdesmitā gadsimta atlētus, kā arī ilustrē svarīgus momentus, kas mainījuši sporta vēstures gaitu.

programme.title: Mana trakā ģimene 19
programme.desc: Pavisam “parasto” Grifinu ģimeni no izdomātās Rodailendas pilsētiņas droši var raksturot kā neaudzinātu, izlutinātu un absolūti nekorektu. Pītera un Luisas Grifinu jaunākais bērns ir inteliģents, sadistisks mazulis, kurš pastāvīgi meklē savu māti un kaļ plānus par pasaules pārņemšanu. Dēlam Krisam ir tikpat zems intelekta līmenis kā viņa tēvam, meita Mega veltīgi cenšas sadraudzēties ar “foršajiem cilvēkiem”, taču vienmēr tiek atstumta. Tikmēr runājošais un martīni malkojošais ģimenes suns Braiens ir vienīgais, kam ir kaut kripatiņa saprāta.

programme.title: Mana trakā ģimene 19

programme.title: Kas to būtu domājis?!
programme.desc: Izklaidējošs minēšanas šovs, kur pie naudas tiek skatītāji! Uz šova vadītāja Mārtiņa Spura asprātīgajiem jautājumiem atbildes meklē komandu kapteiņi Sanda Dejus un Kaspars Breidaks, katru nedēļu palīgā aicinot sabiedrībā zināmus cilvēkus, kas gatavi sacensties attapībā. Spēles azartu vēl vairāk veicina naudas balva – par pareizām atbildēm komandas saņem naudas summu, ko uzvarētāju komanda nevis patur sev, bet sadala starp saviem atbalstītājiem auditorijā.

programme.title: Simpsoni 13
programme.desc: Savu uzvaras gājienu pie TV skatītājiem šī garšīgā humora multene visām gaumēm un vecumiem uzsāka 1987.gadā. Sākotnēji katra sērija bija tikai 30 sekundes gara. Tomēr multenes varoņi asprātīgi joko un smejas ne tikai par citiem (piemēram, Amerikas valdību un daudzām kino un mūzikas zvaigznēm!), bet arī paši par sevi. Tāpēc "Simpsoni" ātri kļuva populāri.

programme.title: Asfalta kaujas
programme.desc: Mūsdienu dzīve ir bīstama – īpaši satiksme uz ceļiem. Šīs sērijas pierādīs, ka ikviens, kurš līdz šim uz ceļa jutās puslīdz droši, maldās. Kameru ierakstos fiksētas visneticamākās avārijas, visneapdomīgākie ātruma pārkāpēji un visnejaukākie šoferi uz pasaules ceļiem. Pat ja šie incidenti parasti beidzas bez smagām sekām, tā ir tīra veiksme, ka negadījāties šo notikumu epicentrā, un varat visu to vērot no drošas vietas uz dīvāna!

programme.title: Gāzi grīdā: Tuvo Austrumu speciālizlaidums. TOP GEAR: MIDDLE EAST SP (2010) YR 16 Ep. 1
programme.desc: Būdami pilnīgā neziņā par to, kāds dulls pārbaudījums gaidāms šoreiz, Klārksons, Mejs un Džeremijs iztērēs producentu piešķirto budžetu 3500 mārciņu apmērā un, kā vēlēts, katrs iegādāsies lietotu divdurvju kabrioletu (jāatzīst gan, ka Džeimss par savu iztērēja 466 mārciņas). Iegādātās automašīnas kopā ar raidījuma vadītājiem ar kravas lidmašīnu tiks nosūtītas uz ceļojuma sākumpunktu, atstājot Gāzi grīdā trijotni absolūtā neziņā, kur viņi nonākuši šoreiz. Tomēr drīz vien atklāsies, ka Gāzi grīdā vadītājus gaida visai saspringts uzdevums Tuvajos Austrumos, kur viņi iejutīsies Trīs Austrumu gudro ādā, izbraucot to pašu garo ceļu līdz Betlēmei, ko savulaik esot mērojuši Bībelē aprakstītie personāži.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri 3
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāki - Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties – nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes, turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – tikko no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Hitlers Entourage
programme.sub-title: Martin Bormann operates in the shadows - inconspicuous, ambitious and unscrupulous, he becomes the man who pulls the strings behind Hitlers power.
programme.desc: They served Hitler, but power struggles tore them apart; this series explores Goebbels, Goring, Speer, Hess, Bormann and Eva Braun through diaries, records, and new research.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.sub-title: The Barnbow shell factory produced well over half a million tonnes of explosives in just four years - we show how the war factories of WWI paved the way for the modern world.
programme.desc: No matter how many soldiers you have, how clever your generals or how daring your strategy, you will not win a war if you dont have enough bullets, planes, or food. WW2 was a war of the factories...

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare
programme.sub-title: Weapons win wars; its been claimed that the human race has spent more time, money, and effort in developing weapons than in any other single field of human endeavour.
programme.desc: This is the story of warfare in the modern age; from the Spitfire to the stealth bombers of the second Iraq conflict, each episode features ten stories from the conflicts of the 20th and 21st century.

programme.title: The World War: 1914-1945
programme.sub-title: War in Europe ends with Soviet and American troops surrounding the German army; in the Pacific, it takes the devastating nuclear bombs of Hiroshima and Nagasaki to force the Japanese surrender.
programme.desc: A series that views the most violent and significant episodes in modern history from a fresh perspective - not as two world wars, but as a continuous narrative of error, ambition, and courage.

programme.title: Out of Europe
programme.desc: For decades most experts have been convinced that Africa is the cradle of mankind, but researchers have come across more finds in recent years that cast doubt on this well-established theory.

programme.title: Queens That Changed The World
programme.sub-title: Victoria presided over a period of history which saw huge industrial, social and territorial expansion; she reignited the public love of the monarchy and led the way for modern royals.
programme.desc: For so long believed to be side characters in histories dominated by men, some queens wielded extraordinary power; we discover how six women ruled in ways that far surpassed their male counterparts.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: The remains of 7,000 humans were discovered in the Hal Saflieni Hypogeum, Maltas Neolithic temple; could the temple reveal the mystery of who they belonged to and what happened to its owners?
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: We discover an intriguing new theory about Gobekli Tepe in southern Turkey; one of the worlds oldest mysteries dating back over 12,000 years, we still dont understand who built it or why.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: The story of how Persia morphed into Iran is very much the story of one family, the Pahlavis. Their reign would prove short-lived for a dynasty, but it was the most tumultuous in the nations history.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare
programme.sub-title: Weapons win wars; its been claimed that the human race has spent more time, money, and effort in developing weapons than in any other single field of human endeavour.
programme.desc: This is the story of warfare in the modern age; from the Spitfire to the stealth bombers of the second Iraq conflict, each episode features ten stories from the conflicts of the 20th and 21st century.

programme.title: Tombs of the Egyptian Priestesses
programme.desc: Egyptian archaeologists uncover a lost cemetery of elite women from the 8th century B.C.E. / B.C., when Kushite kings ruled Egypt and power was shared with the Gods Wife of Amun.

programme.title: Pompeii: The New Dig
programme.sub-title: Italian archaeologists begin the biggest dig in a generation at Pompeiil; they find a bakery, a wealthy house, and a fresco of a so-called pizza before making a grisly discovery.
programme.desc: We follow the biggest excavation of Pompeii in a generation; with access to the archaeological and forensic investigation, we also discover what happened to named survivors and find their descendants.

programme.title: Pompeii: The New Dig
programme.sub-title: A new excavation at Pompeii continues to unearth rich discoveries while a pioneering new investigation finds evidence that some Pompeiians survived the eruption of A.D. / C.E. 79.
programme.desc: We follow the biggest excavation of Pompeii in a generation; with access to the archaeological and forensic investigation, we also discover what happened to named survivors and find their descendants.

programme.title: World War II: The Price of Empire
programme.sub-title: Berlin falls and the war in Europe ends. Okinawa falls with terrible losses on both sides as each prepares for the invasion of the first of the major home islands - but a new weapon is unleashed.
programme.desc: The story of how a world that was centuries in the making was completely remade in years of war. Traditional powers fell from greatness as new forces rose to make the modern world.

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: Decoding A Dictator
programme.sub-title: From his troubled childhood in Austria to his meteoric rise as Fuhrer of Nazi Germany, Adolf Hitlers ruthless personality and distorted worldview were shaped by his daily life.
programme.desc: This series explores six distinctive aspects of the life and rule of Adolf Hitler and questions how a 30-year-old uneducated nobody was able to leave a legacy of unprecedented evil.

programme.title: The World War: 1914-1945
programme.sub-title: War in Europe ends with Soviet and American troops surrounding the German army; in the Pacific, it takes the devastating nuclear bombs of Hiroshima and Nagasaki to force the Japanese surrender.
programme.desc: A series that views the most violent and significant episodes in modern history from a fresh perspective - not as two world wars, but as a continuous narrative of error, ambition, and courage.

programme.title: The Titanic in Colour
programme.sub-title: Artefacts at an auction of Titanic memorabilia in the south of England prove that fascination with the Titanic shows no sign of waning over a century after the sinking of the ship.
programme.desc: The Titanics story is often told in black and white; now the ship is revealed in its true colours with photographs and film footage that have been specially colourised for this series.

programme.title: WWII: Endgame
programme.sub-title: The early years of WWII caused devastation throughout Europe; the 1939 non-aggression pact between the Germans and Russians had promised safety for the Soviet Union, but Hitler was not to be trusted.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Grand Alliance of WWII, the unlikely team of Great Britain, the Soviet Union and the US that came together to defeat Hitler before fracturing and turning on itself.

programme.title: WWII: Endgame
programme.sub-title: Nazi Germanys fate was all but sealed by late 1944, but Hitlers manic denial of this impending defeat would lead to his final gamble at the Battle of the Bulge.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Grand Alliance of WWII, the unlikely team of Great Britain, the Soviet Union and the US that came together to defeat Hitler before fracturing and turning on itself.

programme.title: WWII: Endgame
programme.sub-title: The war in Europe was over, but heavy fighting continued in the East and President Truman was desperate to bring the war to a close in the Pacific.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Grand Alliance of WWII, the unlikely team of Great Britain, the Soviet Union and the US that came together to defeat Hitler before fracturing and turning on itself.

programme.title: WWII: Endgame
programme.sub-title: The emergence of the Cold War wasnt due to one single event; it was born from a series of steps laid by the United States and the Soviet Union, the two main powers of the alliance of WWII.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Grand Alliance of WWII, the unlikely team of Great Britain, the Soviet Union and the US that came together to defeat Hitler before fracturing and turning on itself.

programme.title: The Pharaohs: Greater Than The Pyramids
programme.sub-title: A legendary conqueror, Alexander the Great left his mark on Egypt; this episode explores the mystery surrounding his tomb that symbolises the eternal appeal of his story.
programme.desc: Djoser, Khufu, Ramses II, Ramses III, Alexander the Great and Cleopatra - this series explores the life and reign of these pharaohs while illuminating their relationship with other Pharaonic figures.

programme.title: The Pharaohs: Greater Than The Pyramids
programme.sub-title: Djoser, a pharaoh of the third dynasty, is famous for the construction of the first step pyramid; his reign was marked by monumental achievements and the resolution of a famine.
programme.desc: Djoser, Khufu, Ramses II, Ramses III, Alexander the Great and Cleopatra - this series explores the life and reign of these pharaohs while illuminating their relationship with other Pharaonic figures.

programme.title: Greatest Events of World War II In Colour
programme.sub-title: In the aftermath of Japans attack at Pearl Harbor, the Navy moves in for a knockout blow. Japans next strike is thrown into chaos when its plans are unearthed by an American codebreaker.
programme.desc: A story of World War II told through the ten most pivotal moments in the conflict, supported by exquisitely restored and colourised footage. This is World War II as youve never seen it before.

programme.title: Greatest Events of World War II In Colour
programme.sub-title: 1942: Hitler pits the forces of the German Fatherland against those of the Soviet Motherland at Stalingrad. Stalins fiercely patriotic army will fight the Nazis to the last drop of blood.

programme.title: Unearthed: The Mystery of the Shaman Woman
programme.desc: The grave of Bad Durrenberg revealed not a male warrior, but a powerful and dark-skinned female shaman; misrepresented by the Nazis, her true story still fascinates 9,000 years on.

programme.title: Secrets of the Celtic Grave
programme.desc: Mysterious objects are uncovered on a Welsh farm, triggering a major archaeological investigation; discover the remarkable and violent story of the war of resistance in the Roman Empires Wild West.

programme.title: The Masters of the Reich
programme.sub-title: We look at the Nazi hegemony from 1941 to its decline in 1945; deciphered archives show us the greatest offensive of the 20th century in the East as well as the apocalypse of a ruined Germany.
programme.desc: This series sheds a new light on the Second World War by revealing what the masters of the Reich and their acolytes were really saying to each other while being filmed thinking no-one could hear them.

programme.title: 1945: Days That Changed The World
programme.sub-title: Japan stood at a crossroads after the Hiroshima and Nagasaki bombings; on the 14th of August, 1945, Emperor Hirohito retreated to his office bunker to record a message announcing Japans surrender.
programme.desc: How does one go about ending a global war? This series commemorates the 80th anniversary of the unconditional surrender of Germany and Japan that marked the end of WWII.

programme.title: A Justice of Terror
programme.desc: We reveal how laws were used by the Nazis to justify the unjustifiable and authorise the most heinous of crimes, and we also learn what role jurists played in this reinterpretation of law.

programme.title: Titanic: Secrets of the Shipwreck
programme.sub-title: The dramatic story of the search for the wreck of the Titanic 40 years on from its discovery in the depths of the Atlantic.
programme.desc: On the 40th anniversary of the discovery of the worlds most famous ship, this series tells the true story of how the Titanic was revealed.

programme.title: The Titanic in Colour
programme.sub-title: The first episode takes us from the Titanics construction in Belfast to the final photograph of the ship as she sails into the North Atlantic.
programme.desc: The Titanics story is often told in black and white; now the ship is revealed in its true colours with photographs and film footage that have been specially colourised for this series.

programme.title: The Lost World of the Hanging Gardens
programme.desc: This documentary is a rediscovery of Nineveh, capital of one of the greatest civilisations - the worlds first genuine superpower, the Assyrians. Why did this great city disappear?

programme.title: 1945: Days That Changed The World
programme.sub-title: Japan stood at a crossroads after the Hiroshima and Nagasaki bombings; on the 14th of August, 1945, Emperor Hirohito retreated to his office bunker to record a message announcing Japans surrender.
programme.desc: How does one go about ending a global war? This series commemorates the 80th anniversary of the unconditional surrender of Germany and Japan that marked the end of WWII.

programme.title: Hitlers Entourage
programme.sub-title: Albert Speer presents himself as an architect with style and decency, but his career leads deep into the centre of a murderous regime.
programme.desc: They served Hitler, but power struggles tore them apart; this series explores Goebbels, Goring, Speer, Hess, Bormann and Eva Braun through diaries, records, and new research.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Science
programme.sub-title: Science was a tool to help the war effort for the Nazis; how could a Nazi soldier and its leadership be optimised, and what secret Nazi plans can we glean from a hidden crypt in Thuringia?
programme.desc: When the Nazi empire collapsed at the end of WWII, the darkest secrets of the Third Reich came to light; this series exposes everything from biological experiments to supersize feats of engineering.

programme.title: Vatican Secret Files Exposed: The Pope and the Devil
programme.sub-title: With the war over, thousands of Nazis were fleeing Europe with the help of members of the Vatican, but there was another man who declared himself an enemy of the Pope: Joseph Stalin.
programme.desc: New and previously published documents identified and analysed by a team of experts show that the plans of Pius XII and and his closest collaborators saved over 700,000 Jews during World War II.

programme.title: Out of Europe
programme.desc: For decades most experts have been convinced that Africa is the cradle of mankind, but researchers have come across more finds in recent years that cast doubt on this well-established theory.

programme.title: Cursed Bloodlines
programme.sub-title: The story of how Persia morphed into Iran is very much the story of one family, the Pahlavis. Their reign would prove short-lived for a dynasty, but it was the most tumultuous in the nations history.
programme.desc: From royal families spanning centuries to billionaire business tycoons and their clans, Cursed Bloodlines examines real-life historical instances of tragically ill-fated bloodlines.

programme.title: Greatest Events of World War II In Colour
programme.sub-title: The Allies plan how to break through Hitlers Atlantic Wall for years. The D-Day fleet is the biggest assembled in history, responsible for one of the bloodiest and most extraordinary battles of WW2.
programme.desc: A story of World War II told through the ten most pivotal moments in the conflict, supported by exquisitely restored and colourised footage. This is World War II as youve never seen it before.

programme.title: Greatest Events of World War II In Colour
programme.sub-title: Hitlers audacious plan to turn the tide of the war; colourised archive depicts the Germans opening salvo artillery barrage and George Pattons arrival in Bastogne to break the German siege.
programme.desc: A story of World War II told through the ten most pivotal moments in the conflict, supported by exquisitely restored and colourised footage. This is World War II as youve never seen it before.
